Title: A Multihop Strategy for the Planning of EM Skins in a Smart Electromagnetic Environment
Abstract: this article deals with the electromagnetic  em  planning of static and passive em skins  emss  in complex urban scenarios to improve the em coverage of the base station  bts  antenna by means of a set of multihop  mh  cascaded reflections. toward this end an innovative system by design  sbd  based method is developed where wireless links of arbitrary ‚äúdepth‚äù which are implemented through multiple anomalous cascaded reflections are optimized. representative numerical results concerned with real world scenarios are analyzed to assess the capabilities and the potentialities of such an instance of the so  called smart em environment  seme .
